name: Crate Job Simulator
description:
Scz42 MkII Unit 9784 operational directives

Reroute Commodity Routing And Transport Environments (C.R.A.T.E.s) to designated quantum fax repositories.

  • Priority 1: Maintain positive input/output ratio.
  • Maintaining optimal storage space allocation is secondary priority.
Controls Keyboard
  • Arrow to move
  • Space to grab/release crate
  • Left maj to dash
Gamepad
  • Left stick to move
  • A to grab/release crate
  • RS/R1 to dash
Team Programing
  • Fabien Kalinowski
  • Loic Siquet
  • Quentin Chevalier
Level design
  • Nicolas Lorent
Art
  • Francois Mauge
  • Vincent Schneider
